name: Black Space (itch)
description:
BlackSpace

Black Space is a shoot 'em up space game with a RPG system to upgrade your ship. This game should be hard enough to beat, so you need to prove your skill here.

- Feature :

  • Upgrade able ship (in progress : now only 3 level)
  • Unlock able ship in higher level (in progress - now only 1 ship)
  • Bullet time skill (where you able dodge enemy missile)
  • Storyline  (in progress)
  • 12 stage  (in progress - 3 stage done)
  • 8 bit screen effect

Note that since it is in-development stage, all that you see, hear, experience here may changes by my mood. +if you find bugs, please comment it... thanks!! 

PLEASE ENJOY IT!!

-- This game made with Game Maker 1.4, so should be available in PC, Android (not yet) and IOS (not yet)

by : Me (Bose_agr/Fikri Ramadhan)
